snippet: Boston has been chosen to host the 2016 World Figure Skating Championships, the first time in seven years the event will be in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Boston has been chosen to host the 2016 World Figure Skating Championships, the first time in seven years the event will be in the United States.

headline.seo: Boston to Host 2016 World Figure Skating Championships
headline.main: Boston to Host 2016 World Figure Skating Championships
